content: crochet mini mad hatter hat beacrafter com/crochet-mini-mad-hatter-hat october 3 2013 there are crochet projects i wanted to make long ago before i grabbed a crochet hook this is one of them i ve been toying with the idea of crocheting a tiny mad hatter hat for age at last it is here cid 1 crochet this fast and fun project for a pincushion a nice gift or just an accessory for your baby doll moreover this little thing can be a great decor for your alice in wonderland party theme materials i used 5mm crochet hook worsted weight yarn orange brown this reminds me of the hot red hair color of the character just love it scissors ribbon pins little piece of paper wrote 10/6 on it 1/3 a little feather felt thread and needle yarn needle note this crochet mini mad hatter hat pattern can be made with any crochet hook size choose a yarn type that matches you hook suggestion using join rounds technique join rounds sl into 1st stitch of each round ch1 start from top of the hat r1 magic_ring 7 sts r2 increase x 7 times 14 sts r3 single_crochet increase x 7 times 21 sts r4 increase 2 single_crochet x 7 times 28 sts r5 3 single_crochet increase x 7 times 35 sts r6 increase 4 single_crochet x 7 times 42 sts r7 crochet with back-loops only single_crochet around 42 sts r8 4 single_crochet decrease x 7 times 35 sts r9 to r18 single_crochet around 35 sts r19 single_crochet increase x 17 times 1 single_crochet total 52 sts r20 to r24 single_crochet around 52 sts fasten_off cut a heart shape felt sew on hat to make a patch wind a part of ribbon around the hat 2/3 stick
